mapper.insert: insert into notice_TBL (notice_NUM, notice_TITLE, notice_CONT, notice_DATE) values (notice_seq.nextval, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeCont}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select notice_NUM, notice_TITLE, notice_CONT, notice_DATE from notice_TBL order by notice_num desc
mapper.update: update notice_TBL set notice_TITLE = #{noticeTitle}, notice_CONT = #{noticeCont} where notice_NUM = #{noticeNum}
